info.title: Animal observations API specifications
info.description: Specifications for messages that support livestock animal observations.

tags.name: ADE-1.4 animal observations
tags.description: Animal observations messages approved by the working group.

get.description:
# Purpose 
 This endpoint returns data about animal observations for all animals on a specific location. 
 If animal-scheme and animal-id are provided, only the observations for that animal are returned.

200.description: Successful. The response contains animal observations for the given location.

location-scheme.name: location-scheme
location-scheme.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

location-id.name: location-id
location-id.description: The unique identifier for the location.

animal-scheme.name: animal-scheme
animal-scheme.description: The scheme id for the animal identifier.

animal-id.name: animal-id
animal-id.description: The unique identifier for the animal.

observation-types.name: observation-types
observation-types.description: Observation type that you want to request, see observation types Enum icarObservationType.

observation-datetime-from.name: observation-datetime-from
observation-datetime-from.description: The start datetime of the range in which you want to request data (UTC).

observation-datetime-to.name: observation-datetime-to
observation-datetime-to.description: The end datetime of the range in which you want to request data (UTC).

default.description: An error has occured while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.
